item.title: darktable.gui.views.darkroom
item.description: The darkroom view Attributes: has_tostring parent : types.dt_lua_view_t ðŸ”—darktable.gui.views.darkroom.display_image function( [image : types.dt_lua_image_t] ) : types.dt_lua_image_t Display an image in darkroom view. **[image] - types.dt_lua_image_t - The image to be displayed. If the image is not given, nothing will be changed. return - types.dt_lua_image_t - The image currently displayed.

item.title: darktable.gui.views.lighttable
item.description: The lighttable view Attributes: has_tostring parent : types.dt_lua_view_t ðŸ”—darktable.gui.views.lighttable.is_image_visible function( image : types.dt_lua_image_t ) : types.dt_lua_image_t Check if the image is visible in lighttable view. The lighttable must be in file manager or zoomable mode. image - types.dt_lua_image_t - The image to be checked. return - boolean - True if the image is displayed. False if the image is partially displayed or not displayed. ðŸ”—darktable.gui.views.lighttable.set_image_visible function( image : types.
